basic_info.description: I'm Luke Rogers. I live in Wheaton, Illinois where I graduated from Wheaton College with a bachelors in Business Economics. I was also a two-sport athlete, playing offensive line for the football team and throwing shot-put and discus on the track team. After graduating, I worked as a project manager at a small web development company. During my time there, I observed the developers and the work they did and I decided I wanted to become one. I enrolled in a full time software development bootcamp where I learned languages such as JavaScript, CSS, and React, amongst others. After my bootcamp, I taught myself Python. I am now a UX Projects manager at Christianity Today and web development freelancer for authors excited to use my creativity and problem-solving skills to build tools that will help those in need.

projects.title: HungryHelper
projects.description: Mr. Al's HungryHelper app is a random restaurant generator. The user logs into their account. They fill out a form with price, location, and type of food as required criteria. When they hit submit, a Yelp API sends data to an array matching the criteria they requested. Then I use a random number generator to grab a random restaurant in the array to show to the user. The user can then hit "make reservation" which prompts them to fill out a form in order to make a reservation to the restaurant. The information entered will be uploaded to MongoDB and displayed on the reservations page. The user can also update and delete the reservation.

projects.title: City Explorer
projects.description: This app gives a user the ability to type in any city within the United States. A map of the city, its coordinates, a 5 day weather forecast, and movies and restaurants associated with the city are returned to the user.

projects.title: Glad Gaming: Rock, Paper, Scissors
projects.description: Code Fellows course Code 201's final project. This web application offers a fun and engaging rock-paper-scissors game experience . You can play anytime, anywhere, without needing physical materials or opponents. With its user-friendly interface, you can enjoy playing multiple levels against computer oppenents with their own unique strategy. It's a simple and accessible game suitable for players of all ages and backgrounds, ensuring its wide appeal and enjoyment.
